game.name: Road Less Traveled
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore a vast haunted forest where survival is never guaranteed. Scavenge food, collect water, and fight exhaustion as you push deeper into the woods. Your RV is your lifeline—upgrade it to reach new camps, uncover secrets, and survive the monsters in the dark.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a vast haunted forest where survival is never guaranteed. Scavenge food, collect water, and fight exhaustion as you push deeper into the woods. Your RV is your lifeline—upgrade it to reach new camps, uncover secrets, and survive the monsters in the dark.
